 Galvatron held the matrix of peace. His spark appeared and shot out a dark 
light. It corrupted the matrix and it became black as coal. It was now the 
matrix of War. His spark appeaered in it. A dark light shown and suddenly red 
rays grabbed the four stolen sparks. They where all absorbed into 
Galvatrton's spark. Magnus's body was then absorbed. A great black light shot 
out. Every living thing on the planet good see it. The from the black fire 
came Galvatron. He had grown an inch and his chest plate could slide out to 
expose missles.  All his organic material was gone do to Magnu's body. He 
lost his absorption capapability but gained something more. He stole the 
oracle from Magnus. It showed swerving around his waist. The outside turned 
from a gold ring to a black one. He spoke in a boooming voice. 
 "The sleeping lion has awakend. I am the prince of all Darkness once more!" 
He exposed his black flame sword wich could be turned into the syth also. 
"Now onto my next vicitim. But first I need rest" He flew towards the Destron 
base at an unchartable speed. Magnus has increased his speed a little  but 
not much. His eyes where fixed. His target now his equal instead of superior.

--part1_67.f2155b7.27a9e76c_boundary
